how do i UNinstall ubuntu?: are you planing on using the partition/s or making new ones ?

if you are going to use the linux partition/s simple wat is mkfs.ext3 the partition.  else  c/fdisk  is the answer.     but be advised that if you use grub you may not be able to boot after such actions.
use xp to reclaim the 'now linux' partition  and fix your mbr
